Document.Focus: Fine needle aspiration of the thyroid

Synonyms.Synonym: Thyroid nodule fine needle aspirate biopsy

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Fine needle aspiration of the thyroid
QAPair.Answer: Fine needle aspiration of the thyroid gland is a procedure to remove thyroid cells for examination. The thyroid gland is a butterfly-shaped gland located inside the front of the lower neck.
